Other units of automatic data-processing machines

category.description: Medical equipment, aids and other appliances normally intended to alleviate or treat disability, for the exclusive personal use of the disabled, including the repair of such goods

vatRateResults.comment:
This reduced rate applies only to typhlo-technical aids:
— data casting machines, voice synthesisers; 8471 80 00
— voice synthesisers, unrecorded; 8543 70 90
— electronic notebook with voice synthesisers, 8470 10 00

vatRateResults.comment: This reduced rate applies only to typewriters with memory and reproduction device, specially adapted for use by the blind and visually impaired persons, 8472 90 80.

code.description: Discs, tapes, solid-state non-volatile storage devices, ‘smart cards’ and other media for the recording of sound or of other phenomena, whether or not recorded, including matrices and masters for the production of discs, but excluding products of Chapter 37

category.description: Medical equipment, aids and other appliances normally intended to alleviate or treat disability, for the exclusive personal use of the disabled, including the repair of such goods

vatRateResults.comment: This reduced rate applies only to customised software for people with disabilities: — special software to simplify activities that require fine coordination (replacement of key combinations, macros and others); — special software for visualisation of sounds; — software to enlarge text  (Zoom text); — screen reading software ; — special programming software.

category.description: Medical equipment, aids and other appliances normally intended to alleviate or treat disability, for the exclusive personal use of the disabled, including the repair of such goods

vatRateResults.comment: This reduced rate applies only to tricycles produced for persons with disabilities, in the form of pedals or hand driven cycles.
